item.title: Report E-2023090525
item.description:
Report E-2023090525

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-21T15:10:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-06
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: XPO Logistics terminal UDV experienced a UN1789 Hydrochloric Acid 31% release from a 330-gallon poly tote. ERTS dispatched contactors for cleanup and containment. Contractors arrived onsite and confirmed approximately 1-ounce of material released to the top of the tote in a 1’ x 1’ area due to a loose/damaged cap. The cap was replaced with a new one and the tote was wiped down with a sodium bicarb solution. The damaged cap, impacted rags, and PPE were then containerized into a 55-gallon poly drum. The waste was staged onsite for terminal personnel to manage.

  • Description: During off loading the warehouse crew accidentally put a forklift fork into one of the metal 55 gallon drum of brake cleaner ( un1993) releasing 10 gallons of product. The warehouse crew was able to contain and cleanup the release, so no contractors were dispatched.

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Qa was called to trailer 828815 and pkg. was in trailer wet and QA placed inside a lined tote and took to hazmat cage. DescribePack: Closures came loose which caused the liquid to leak out and soil outer carton and inner bottles. DurationRel: 40 and MitigateEffect: Pkg. was placed inside a lined tote and was taken to hazmat cage.

item.title: Report X-2023082022
item.description:
Report X-2023082022

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-26T18:14:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-26
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Leaking package discovered during sortation. Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA. DescribePack: Steel drum with lug-type removable head and pail-style handle . No arrows on exterior. Top and bottom rims of drum and head dented, compromising seal and allowing leakage which damaged exterior labels. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA.

item.title: Report X-2023081963
item.description:
Report X-2023081963

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-26T18:14:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-26
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Leaking package discovered during sortation. Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA. DescribePack: Metal paint cans in doublewall corrugated carton with corrugated liners and dividers. Only two lid clips per can. Lid lifted on one can and allowed contents to spill, soiling all cans and damaging carton. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA.
